articles.title: Monkeypox outbreak tops 50,000 cases worldwide - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: More than 50,000 monkeypox cases have been recorded in the global outbreak, World Health Organisation figures showed Wednesday; but transmission is slowing in the virus hotspots of Europe and the United States.
